crud.jsonrpc: SELECT CARD_NO "cardno",USER_ID "userid",BAL_AT_REPORTING "balatreporting",BAL_AT_BLOCKING "balatblocking",TOTAL_MISUSED_AMOUNT "totalmisusedamount",REPORTING_TIME "reportingtime",BLOCKING_TIME "blockingtime",CARD_INSURE_AVAIL "cardinsureavail",INS_AMOUNT_CLAIMED "insamountclaimed",REPLACE_CARD_NO "replacecardno",REFUND_EXPIRY_DATE "refundexpirydate",REFUND_STATUS "refundstatus",POLICE_REPORT_NUMBER "policereportnumber",POLICE_REPORT_DUE_DATE "policereportduedate",POLICE_REPORT_FILE_NAME "policereportfilename",SAW_FILE_REF_ID "sawfilerefid",SAW_RESULT "sawresult",INSUR_FILE_REF_ID "insurfilerefid",INSUR_RESULT "insurresult",MTR_FILE_REF_ID "mtrfilerefid",EMAIL_NOTIFIED "emailnotified",SAW_TXN_REF "sawtxnref",INSUR_FILE_RECV_DATE "insurfilerecvdate",SAW_FILE_RECV_DATE "sawfilerecvdate",MTR_FILE_RECV_DATE "mtrfilerecvdate",REPLACE_CARD_NO_TMP "replacecardnotmp",REFUND_MODE "refundmode",REFUND_CHANNEL "refundchannel" FROM CARD_BLOCK_REFUND select count('x') from CARD_BLOCK_REFUND

SELECT CARD_NO "cardno",USER_ID "userid",BAL_AT_REPORTING "balatreporting",BAL_AT_BLOCKING "balatblocking",TOTAL_MISUSED_AMOUNT "totalmisusedamount",REPORTING_TIME "reportingtime",BLOCKING_TIME "blockingtime",CARD_INSURE_AVAIL "cardinsureavail",INS_AMOUNT_CLAIMED "insamountclaimed",REPLACE_CARD_NO "replacecardno",REFUND_EXPIRY_DATE "refundexpirydate",REFUND_STATUS "refundstatus",POLICE_REPORT_NUMBER "policereportnumber",POLICE_REPORT_DUE_DATE "policereportduedate",POLICE_REPORT_FILE_NAME "policereportfilename",SAW_FILE_REF_ID "sawfilerefid",SAW_RESULT "sawresult",INSUR_FILE_REF_ID "insurfilerefid",INSUR_RESULT "insurresult",MTR_FILE_REF_ID "mtrfilerefid",EMAIL_NOTIFIED "emailnotified",SAW_TXN_REF "sawtxnref",INSUR_FILE_RECV_DATE "insurfilerecvdate",SAW_FILE_RECV_DATE "sawfilerecvdate",MTR_FILE_RECV_DATE "mtrfilerecvdate",REPLACE_CARD_NO_TMP "replacecardnotmp",REFUND_MODE "refundmode",REFUND_CHANNEL "refundchannel" FROM CARD_BLOCK_REFUND select count('x') from CARD_BLOCK_REFUND
crud.sqlinsert: insert into CARD_BLOCK_REFUND( CARD_NO, USER_ID, BAL_AT_REPORTING, BAL_AT_BLOCKING, TOTAL_MISUSED_AMOUNT, REPORTING_TIME, BLOCKING_TIME, CARD_INSURE_AVAIL, INS_AMOUNT_CLAIMED, REPLACE_CARD_NO, REFUND_EXPIRY_DATE, REFUND_STATUS, POLICE_REPORT_NUMBER, POLICE_REPORT_DUE_DATE, POLICE_REPORT_FILE_NAME, SAW_FILE_REF_ID, SAW_RESULT, INSUR_FILE_REF_ID, INSUR_RESULT, MTR_FILE_REF_ID, EMAIL_NOTIFIED, SAW_TXN_REF, INSUR_FILE_RECV_DATE, SAW_FILE_RECV_DATE, MTR_FILE_RECV_DATE, REPLACE_CARD_NO_TMP, REFUND_MODE, REFUND_CHANNEL) values ( #inp.form1[0].cardno, #inp.form1[0].userid, #inp.form1[0].balatreporting, #inp.form1[0].balatblocking, #inp.form1[0].totalmisusedamount, #inp.form1[0].reportingtime, #inp.form1[0].blockingtime, #inp.form1[0].cardinsureavail, #inp.form1[0].insamountclaimed, #inp.form1[0].replacecardno, #inp.form1[0].refundexpirydate, #inp.form1[0].refundstatus, #inp.form1[0].policereportnumber, #inp.form1[0].policereportduedate, #inp.form1[0].policereportfilename, #inp.form1[0].sawfilerefid, #inp.form1[0].sawresult, #inp.form1[0].insurfilerefid, #inp.form1[0].insurresult, #inp.form1[0].mtrfilerefid, #inp.form1[0].emailnotified, #inp.form1[0].sawtxnref, #inp.form1[0].insurfilerecvdate, #inp.form1[0].sawfilerecvdate, #inp.form1[0].mtrfilerecvdate, #inp.form1[0].replacecardnotmp, #inp.form1[0].refundmode, #inp.form1[0].refundchannel )

insert into CARD_BLOCK_REFUND( CARD_NO, USER_ID, BAL_AT_REPORTING, BAL_AT_BLOCKING, TOTAL_MISUSED_AMOUNT, REPORTING_TIME, BLOCKING_TIME, CARD_INSURE_AVAIL, INS_AMOUNT_CLAIMED, REPLACE_CARD_NO, REFUND_EXPIRY_DATE, REFUND_STATUS, POLICE_REPORT_NUMBER, POLICE_REPORT_DUE_DATE, POLICE_REPORT_FILE_NAME, SAW_FILE_REF_ID, SAW_RESULT, INSUR_FILE_REF_ID, INSUR_RESULT, MTR_FILE_REF_ID, EMAIL_NOTIFIED, SAW_TXN_REF, INSUR_FILE_RECV_DATE, SAW_FILE_RECV_DATE, MTR_FILE_RECV_DATE, REPLACE_CARD_NO_TMP, REFUND_MODE, REFUND_CHANNEL) values ( #inp.form1[0].cardno, #inp.form1[0].userid, #inp.form1[0].balatreporting, #inp.form1[0].balatblocking, #inp.form1[0].totalmisusedamount, #inp.form1[0].reportingtime, #inp.form1[0].blockingtime, #inp.form1[0].cardinsureavail, #inp.form1[0].insamountclaimed, #inp.form1[0].replacecardno, #inp.form1[0].refundexpirydate, #inp.form1[0].refundstatus, #inp.form1[0].policereportnumber, #inp.form1[0].policereportduedate, #inp.form1[0].policereportfilename, #inp.form1[0].sawfilerefid, #inp.form1[0].sawresult, #inp.form1[0].insurfilerefid, #inp.form1[0].insurresult, #inp.form1[0].mtrfilerefid, #inp.form1[0].emailnotified, #inp.form1[0].sawtxnref, #inp.form1[0].insurfilerecvdate, #inp.form1[0].sawfilerecvdate, #inp.form1[0].mtrfilerecvdate, #inp.form1[0].replacecardnotmp, #inp.form1[0].refundmode, #inp.form1[0].refundchannel )
crud.sqlupdate: update CARD_BLOCK_REFUND set USER_ID = #inp.form1[0].userid, BAL_AT_REPORTING = #inp.form1[0].balatreporting, BAL_AT_BLOCKING = #inp.form1[0].balatblocking, TOTAL_MISUSED_AMOUNT = #inp.form1[0].totalmisusedamount, REPORTING_TIME = #inp.form1[0].reportingtime, BLOCKING_TIME = #inp.form1[0].blockingtime, CARD_INSURE_AVAIL = #inp.form1[0].cardinsureavail, INS_AMOUNT_CLAIMED = #inp.form1[0].insamountclaimed, REPLACE_CARD_NO = #inp.form1[0].replacecardno, REFUND_EXPIRY_DATE = #inp.form1[0].refundexpirydate, REFUND_STATUS = #inp.form1[0].refundstatus, POLICE_REPORT_NUMBER = #inp.form1[0].policereportnumber, POLICE_REPORT_DUE_DATE = #inp.form1[0].policereportduedate, POLICE_REPORT_FILE_NAME = #inp.form1[0].policereportfilename, SAW_FILE_REF_ID = #inp.form1[0].sawfilerefid, SAW_RESULT = #inp.form1[0].sawresult, INSUR_FILE_REF_ID = #inp.form1[0].insurfilerefid, INSUR_RESULT = #inp.form1[0].insurresult, MTR_FILE_REF_ID = #inp.form1[0].mtrfilerefid, EMAIL_NOTIFIED = #inp.form1[0].emailnotified, SAW_TXN_REF = #inp.form1[0].sawtxnref, INSUR_FILE_RECV_DATE = #inp.form1[0].insurfilerecvdate, SAW_FILE_RECV_DATE = #inp.form1[0].sawfilerecvdate, MTR_FILE_RECV_DATE = #inp.form1[0].mtrfilerecvdate, REPLACE_CARD_NO_TMP = #inp.form1[0].replacecardnotmp, REFUND_MODE = #inp.form1[0].refundmode, REFUND_CHANNEL = #inp.form1[0].refundchannel WHERE CARD_NO=#inp.form1[0].cardno

update CARD_BLOCK_REFUND set USER_ID = #inp.form1[0].userid, BAL_AT_REPORTING = #inp.form1[0].balatreporting, BAL_AT_BLOCKING = #inp.form1[0].balatblocking, TOTAL_MISUSED_AMOUNT = #inp.form1[0].totalmisusedamount, REPORTING_TIME = #inp.form1[0].reportingtime, BLOCKING_TIME = #inp.form1[0].blockingtime, CARD_INSURE_AVAIL = #inp.form1[0].cardinsureavail, INS_AMOUNT_CLAIMED = #inp.form1[0].insamountclaimed, REPLACE_CARD_NO = #inp.form1[0].replacecardno, REFUND_EXPIRY_DATE = #inp.form1[0].refundexpirydate, REFUND_STATUS = #inp.form1[0].refundstatus, POLICE_REPORT_NUMBER = #inp.form1[0].policereportnumber, POLICE_REPORT_DUE_DATE = #inp.form1[0].policereportduedate, POLICE_REPORT_FILE_NAME = #inp.form1[0].policereportfilename, SAW_FILE_REF_ID = #inp.form1[0].sawfilerefid, SAW_RESULT = #inp.form1[0].sawresult, INSUR_FILE_REF_ID = #inp.form1[0].insurfilerefid, INSUR_RESULT = #inp.form1[0].insurresult, MTR_FILE_REF_ID = #inp.form1[0].mtrfilerefid, EMAIL_NOTIFIED = #inp.form1[0].emailnotified, SAW_TXN_REF = #inp.form1[0].sawtxnref, INSUR_FILE_RECV_DATE = #inp.form1[0].insurfilerecvdate, SAW_FILE_RECV_DATE = #inp.form1[0].sawfilerecvdate, MTR_FILE_RECV_DATE = #inp.form1[0].mtrfilerecvdate, REPLACE_CARD_NO_TMP = #inp.form1[0].replacecardnotmp, REFUND_MODE = #inp.form1[0].refundmode, REFUND_CHANNEL = #inp.form1[0].refundchannel WHERE CARD_NO=#inp.form1[0].id|STRING
